edge: Lead character of the story, Jamie Dornan plays Christian Grey in the movie.
Ana's boss at SIP and stalker, Eric Johnson portrays Jack Hyde in the movie.
One of Christian's former submissives, Bella Heathcote depicts Leila Williams in the movie.
Christian and Elliot's adoptive younger sister, Rita Ora performs as Mia Grey in the movie.
Anastasia's mother (Unrated Edition), Jennifer Ehle portrays Carla Wilks in the movie.
Christian's adoptive older brother, Luke Grimes enacts Elliot Grey in the movie.
One of Anastasia's friends, Victor Rasuk plays José Rodriguez in the movie.
Christian's bodyguard and head of security, Max Martini portrays Jason Taylor in the movie.
President of SIP, Bruce Altman acts as Jerry Roach in the movie.
Christian's business partner and former lover, Kim Basinger performs as Elena Lincoln in the movie.
Christian's adoptive mother, Marcia Gay Harden depicts Grace Trevelyan-Grey in the movie.
